title: 2024 Porsche Panamera launched in India; Check price, features, performance and more
description: Introducing the latest luxury offering in the Indian automotive market: the 2024 Porsche Panamera. Priced at Rs 1.70 crore (ex-showroom), this third-generation Panamera comes packed with upgrades across design, features, chassis, and powertrain. With deliveries set to kick off promptly, let's delve into the remarkable enhancements that define this new Panamera experience.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
